Series II. Personnel: Vice President and Director: Robert M. Steed Files
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records

International contains correspondence between Robert Steed in the corporate personnel office and staff from the international Time Inc. offices. The records also include directories, personnel office policies, and personnel statistics.
